mapper.select: SELECT * From review WHERE BOOK_NO = #{book_no} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (REVIEW_NO,USER_ID,BOOK_NO,REVIEW_CONTENT,REVIEW_DATE,REVIEW_RECOMMEND,REVIEW_STAR) values ( (select NVL(max(REVIEW_NO),0)+1 from review), #{user_id}, #{book_no}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{review_recommend}, #{review_star})
mapper.select: SELECT review_star, COUNT(review_star) as starCount, NVL(ROUND((COUNT(review_star)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE book_no=#{book_no}))*100,2),0) as proportion FROM review WHERE book_no = #{book_no} GROUP BY review_star ORDER BY review_star
